'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is only accessible during the [[Prologue]].

==Background==
The In-Between is a place where spirits dwell before taking their last voyage to the Beyond. It is an other-worldly amalgam of locations suspended in time and space. 

==Points of interest==
* This is the starting area of the game, where you first get the run-down of the events happening in the Deadfire, and create/import your character. It's a simple linear path, and the camera is locked - so there's not much to explore.
* On the left side is an adra pillar and your starting location. [[The Usher]], a form of [[Berath]] greets you here and leads you to the next area. As you walk forward, a path will form leading to a stone structure held by a giant skeletal hand.
* After speaking with [[The Pallid Knight]], another form of Berath, you advance to the [[Captain's Cabin]], where you're reunited with your body, and a very-surprised [[Ed√©r]].

==Characters==
* [[The Usher]], a decrepit form of Berath, who leads you to the central area.
* [[The Pallid Knight]], a familiar form of Berath, who you interact with throughout the game.
